name: verifier
short: Allows verified users to verify other users by mentioning them in a set channel
description: The verifier cog allows users who have already been verified to verify other users by mentioning them in a set channel. This is useful for servers that require verification before granting access to certain channels or features.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Verifier!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
